alert.note: Alert for Adams (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 24 at 11:28AM CDT until further notice by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Missouri...Illinois... Mississippi River at Winfield. Mississippi River at Quincy. Mississippi River at Lock & Dam 21. Mississippi River at LaGrange. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Missouri...Illinois... Mississippi River at Clarksville. Mississippi River at Hannibal. Mississippi River at Louisiana. Mississippi River at Saverton. Mississippi River at Canton. River forecasts are based on observed precipitation and forecast precipitation for the next 24 hours. ...FLOOD WARNING FOR SNOWMELT REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY EVENING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Mississippi River at Canton. * WHEN...From Tuesday evening until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 18.0 feet, Near this level, the lock is closed to navigation. This level will vary with circumstance. Also, Main Street leading to the lock and dam and the railroad crossing at Henderson Street flood at this height. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:00 AM CDT Monday the stage was 13.9 feet. - Bankfull stage is 14.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late tomorrow evening and continue rising to 18.0 feet Sunday morning. Additional rises are possible thereafter. - Flood stage is 15.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (7:00 am) Location Stg Stage Tue Wed Thu Fri Sat Mississippi River Canton 15.0 13.9 14.6 15.2 15.8 16.6 17.3 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. This product, along with additional weather and stream information, is available at https://water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=lsx.
